name: Sum of Array
description: Write a function that takes an array of numbers as input and returns the sum of all the numbers in the array.

name: Prime Numbers
description: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns true if the number is prime, false otherwise. A prime number is a number that is greater than 1 and has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself.

name: Even or Odd
description: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns 'even' if the number is even, and 'odd' if the number is odd.

name: Reverse String
description: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns the reverse of the string.

name: Factorial
description: Write a function that takes a non-negative integer as input and returns the factorial of that number. The factorial of a number n is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n.

name: Palindrome
description: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns true if the string is a palindrome, false otherwise. A palindrome is a word, phrase, number, or other sequence of characters that reads the same forward and backward.

name: Fibonacci Sequence
description: Write a function that takes a positive integer n as input and returns the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence. The Fibonacci sequence starts with 0 and 1, and each subsequent number is the sum of the two preceding numbers.

name: Factorial
description: Write a function that takes a non-negative integer as input and returns the factorial of that number. The factorial of a number n is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n.

name: Count Vowels
description: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns the number of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) in the string.

name: Binary to Decimal
description: Write a function that takes a binary number as input and returns its decimal equivalent.
